channel.title: Carmel-By-The-Sea on TobyTime

item.title: Pacific Coast Highway Road Trip Part Three: Monterey, Carmel, and Big Sur
item.description: Asilomar Trail We began our morning in Monterey with a walk along the beautiful Asilomar Trail by the coast. You can start walking from various spots along the road so feel free to park anywhere you see an open spot. The trail is a dirt path with pretty flowers, sand, and rocks by the sea. It can get windy, so bring a light jacket, and there’s no shade, so use sunscreen!
